parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: IncludeKnowledgeBaseResults
parameters.description: Whether to return the retrieved result. Default value: false.

parameters.name: KnowledgeParams
parameters.description: The knowledge retrieval parameter object. If you do not specify this parameter, only chat mode is enabled.

parameters.name: ModelParams
parameters.description: The Large Language Model (LLM) invocation parameter object.

parameters.name: PromptParams
parameters.description: The system prompt template, which should include {{ text_chunks }},{{ user_system_prompt }},{{ graph_entities },{{ graph_relations }}. If any of these placeholders are not specified, the corresponding section should have no effect.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.
